Key Match Events: Makono Eldinho scored the winner for Burundi in the 87th minute
Chimwemwe Idana scored for Malawi in the 29th minute
Jean Claude Girumugisha scored for Burundi in the 34th minute
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the second-ever meeting across all competitions between Burundi and Malawi
Others: Malawi is ranked 13 places above Burundi
